scripts.test: npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run test:all
scripts.test:docker: npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run test:all:docker
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:feature
scripts.test:all:docker: npm run test:unit && npm run test:feature:docker
scripts.test:feature: concurrently --names 'server,test' 'npm run dev -- --port 3001' 'wait-for-localhost 3001 && PORT=3001 npm run test:feature:noserver' --kill-others --success first
scripts.test:feature:docker: concurrently --names 'docker,test' 'docker run --rm --publish 3001:3000 ${TEST_DOCKER_IMAGE}' 'wait-for-localhost 3001 && PORT=3001 npm run test:feature:noserver' --kill-others --success first
scripts.test:feature:update: concurrently --names 'server,test' 'npm run dev -- --port 3001' 'wait-for-localhost 3001 && PORT=3001 npm run test:feature:noserver -- --updateSnapshot' --kill-others --success first
scripts.test:feature:watch: concurrently --names 'server,test' 'npm run dev -- --port 3001' 'wait-for-localhost 3001 && PORT=3001 npm run test:feature:noserver -- --watch' --kill-others --success first
